asypad.shapes

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • asypad.shapes.Shape
      • asypad.shapes.Point

  • public class Point
extends Shape
    Custom Point used for drawing in AsyPad.
    Author:
    Raymond Feng

      • Point

        public Point(Line l,
             Circle c,
             boolean identifier)
        Constructs an intersection point between a line and a circle with no label. Identifier = true represents the intersection point that is closer to the start of the line.
        Parameters:
        l - line
        c - circle
        identifier - which intersection point this will be

        public Point(Line l,

        c - circle

        name - name of point

      • Point

        public Point(Circle c1,
             Circle c2,
             boolean identifier,
             java.lang.String name)
        Constructs an intersection point between circles c1 and c2. Identifier = true represents the intersection point that is more counterclockwise wrt the first circle.
        Parameters:
        c1 - first circle
        c2 - second circle
        identifier - which intersection point this will be
        name - name of point
